title: Run Manifest
description: Schema for ROS run manifest artifacts that provide complete provenance for pipeline executions

run_date.description: ISO 8601 date or datetime of run execution

workflow_name.description: Name of the pipeline or workflow executed

git_commit.description: Git commit hash of the code used for this run

data_version_id.description: Identifier(s) for input data snapshots or versions

artifacts.description: Paths to QA and output artifacts produced by this run

qa_json.description: Path to machine-readable QA metrics JSON

qa_summary.description: Path to human-readable QA summary (MD or HTML)

baseline_reference.description: Identifier of the baseline used for drift comparison (optional)

notes.description: Optional notes or context for this run
